content: tail onto the yarn holders after the last two them being in the correct order for later legs have been placed on them remembering to beginning the head/neck… place the last 4 stitches onto yarn holder b leaving long tail and using turtle color a tail 2 legs head 2 legs cast on 12 sts and join in-the-round… round 1 k 2 k1 m1 x 2 k2 m1 k1 x 2 k6 = 16 sts 3 k b 4 k3 m1 k1 x 2 k1 m1 x 2 k9 = 20 sts 5-9 k a 10 k1 k2tog x 6 k7 = 14 sts 11-16 k now that all the legs head/neck and tail have been 17 k2 m1 k4 m1 k3 m1 k1 x 2 placed in the correct order onto the yarn holders k1 m1 x2 k1 = 20 sts you will begin placing the stitches from yarn holder do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail this tail b onto the needles… head will be used later to close the opening between the beginning at the head/neck and the leg stuff head the flat side is the tail end place underside of the head/neck …now at the cast-on the 50 sts from edge thread yarn tail onto large-eyed blunt needle yarn holder b insert needle through the outer loops of the 12 cast- onto the on stitches and pull up to gather and secure needles so the eyes and a mouth may be embroidered at this time stitches on yarn to make the eyes i used a french knot wrapping the yarn around the needle 4x holder a are place the head/neck onto the yarn holders with the on the inside of first two legs remembering to place the last 10 the circle when stitches onto yarn holder b you join to knit in the round beginning the tail… tail leaving long tail and using turtle color a cast on 8 sts and join in-the-round… beginning the underside of the turtle… rounds 1-7 k round 1 attach working yarn and knit around do not bind off cut yarn leaving long yarn tail this 2 k3 k2tog x 10 = 40 sts yarn tail will be used later to close the opening between 3 k the tail and the leg stuff tail…now at the cast-on 4 k2tog x 20 = 20 sts edge thread yarn tail onto large-eyed blunt needle 5 k 6 k2tog x 10 = 10 sts 5 inquiries contact
